document_data.caption: A map showing Even's Gulf in the Easting Reach.
document_data.name: Even's Gulf
document_data.mainbody: '''Even's Gulf''' was a gulf in the [[Easting Reach]] that separated [[Impiltur]] and the [[Great Dale]].
document_data.Geography: The Gulf of Lath was the northernmost edge of the Easting Reach, which, in turn, was part of the much larger [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. The [[Buzzard Beak Harbor]] was located immediately to the gulf's south. Even's Gulf was fed by two major rivers: the [[Easting River]] what continued to separate Impiltur and the Great Dale, and the [[Forest Blood River]] on the Great Dale's side.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Ilmwatch]], a large fortress-town that stood on the infamous Buzzard Beak Harbor and Gulf of Lath.
* [[Solin]], a coastal town in the [[Great Dale]].
* [[Uthmere]], a walled port town of the Great Dale.
